titles.title: A resolution to constitute the minority party's membership on certain of the standing committees for the 103d Congress, or until their successors are chosen.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 7/1/1993--Introduced. Elects as the minority party's membership: (1) Senators Thurmond, Warner, Cohen, McCain, Lott, Coats, Smith, Kempthorne, Faircloth, and Hutchison to the Senate Committee on Armed Services; (2) Senators Danforth, Packwood, Pressler, Stevens, McCain, Burns, Gorton, Lott, and Hutchison to the Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation; (3) Senators Helms, Lugar, Kassebaum, Pressler, Murkowski, Brown, Jeffords, Coverdell, and Gregg to the Senate Committee on Foreign Relations; and (4) Senators Pressler, Wallop, Bond, Burns, Mack, Coverdell, Kempthorne, Bennett, Chafee, and Hutchison to the Senate Committee on Small Business.
